name: stick-figures
description: students will create stick figures using natural materials.
set-up: lay out materials on the table,seperate materials by category, lay out paper and glue
outcomes: students responded well to the hands on project. The use of natural materials helped provide tactile repononse.

name: name-beads
description: Students will spell out their name using letter beads, with guidance of a name print out
set-up: print out paper name print-outs, leave room for students to glue letter beads, supply letter beads (do not sort by letter) and glue
outcomes: students were able to train hand-eye coordination with the use of small letter beads, as well as training reading comprehension
